title: The Little Girl Who Was Forgotten by Absolutely Everyone
description: Emmeline has been forgotten by absolutely everyone. Yes, even the postman. She has everything a child could want, but not the one thing every child - and every grownup, too - needs. Love. Desperate for a friend, Emmeline makes a wish upon a magical star. It is a wish that will forever change the lives of everyone she knows.
author: Katy Towell
